**TxDOT LTA BILL ANALYSIS MARKED FOR DELETION**
The LTA Bill Analysis {!LTA_Bill_Analysis__c.Name} has been marked for deletion.
Please DELETE this record promptly before the new version for the associated Bill is loaded.
